channel.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
channel.description:
eek how do make it so when i use any kind of LOG on a TINDERBOX you move a step...
right now only work for me when i use a tinder box first. so it moves...

item.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

you mean doing if and elses? of this on that and that on this?

Read full topic

item.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Try taking out the else. If that doesn’t work, then make it

if ((itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(180, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); resetWC(); } else { sM("You need a firemaking of 0 to burn normal logs."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)|| (itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(180, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); resetWC(); } else { sM("You need a firemaking of 0 to burn normal logs."); } }

? It should work.

item.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

This is the code:

} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(180, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); resetWC(); } else { sM("You need a firemaking of 0 to burn normal logs."); } }

I just add

|| (itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590)

after the

(itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)

item.title: Wood+TinderBox=Fire+Move
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Ohhh. Just switch the ID’s. Instead of box useWith wood, make it wood useWith box. That’s simple enough =P So you don’t have to rewrite it, try using ||. And why does everyone ask that?
